name: Sponge Massacre
description:
A video game made for windows

Objective

Collect 7 krabby patties to open a secret door in SpongeBob's kitchen.

Story

SpongeBob hasn't gone to work in a very long time. He's been acting suspicious, Bikini Bottom Police got a call from Mr Crab's. He reported strange noise coming from his home. The next day Patrick, Squidward and Sandy were reported missing. Bikini Bottom Police decided to raid SpongeBob's house.

You play as one of the police officers of the Bikini Bottom Police.

Warning

I do NOT own any rights to Spongebob Squarpants and this is NOT an official Spongebob product. This game is a FAN game.

All donations are considered as a support of the game developer and not as an payment for the game!

This game contains jumpscares, flashing lights, scary and disturbing content.
